item.title: 特朗普称将把针对特斯拉经销商的暴力行为称为国内恐怖主义
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，他将把针对特斯拉经销商的暴力行为称为国内恐怖主义，他与特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）一起出席了活动，在最近的 "特斯拉拆迁 "抗议活动和该公司股价下滑之际表示支持。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he will label violence against Tesla dealerships domestic terrorism as he appeared with Tesla CEO Elon Musk to show support amid recent "Tesla Takedown" protests and the slump in the company's stock price.】

item.title: Uber 终止收购 Delivery Hero's Foodpanda 业务
item.description: 优步（Uber）周二表示，已决定终止收购 Delivery Hero 在台湾的 Foodpanda 业务的协议，并将支付约 2.5 亿美元的终止费。【原文：Uber has decided terminate its agreement to acquire Delivery Hero's Foodpanda business in Taiwan and will pay a termination fee of around $250 million, the food delivery company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 专家称特朗普征收钢铝关税将提高美国能源企业成本
item.description: 美国拟对进口钢铁和铝征收关税，这将使依赖这些金属开展业务的美国油田服务公司的成本上升。【原文：The proposed U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminum imports are poised to escalate costs for U.S. oilfield services companies, which rely on these metals for their operations.】

item.title: 据《DN》报报道，Northvolt 接近在瑞典申请破产
item.description: 据瑞典报纸《Dagens Nyheter》（DN）周二报道，瑞典电动汽车电池制造商 Northvolt 可能即将在瑞典申请破产。【原文：Northvolt, the Swedish maker of battery cells for electric vehicles, may be close to filing for bankruptcy in Sweden, Swedish newspaper Dagens Nyheter (DN) reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着中国人工智能初创企业的发展，OpenAI 推出新的开发者工具
item.description: 在来自中国人工智能初创企业的竞争日益激烈之际，OpenAI 周二推出了面向开发者的新工具，帮助他们使用一些应用编程接口（API）构建先进的人工智能代理。【原文：OpenAI launched new tools for developers on Tuesday that will help them build advanced AI agents, using a few application programming interfaces (APIs), amid growing competition from Chinese AI startups.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 执行总裁表示，监管机构已批准切尼尔德克萨斯州液化天然气厂扩建项目
item.description: 切尼尔公司的一位高管周二表示，美国监管机构已经批准了切尼尔公司位于得克萨斯州科珀斯克里斯蒂液化天然气（LNG）厂的扩建项目。【原文：US regulators have approved the expansion of Cheniere's Corpus Christi liquefied natural gas (LNG) plant in Texas, a Cheniere executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彪马在美国和中国的季度销售额下降
item.description: 彪马周二表示，由于美国和中国市场表现疲软，预计经货币调整后的销售额增长率将为较低的个位数，低于前几年的水平。【原文：Puma said on Tuesday it expects currency-adjusted sales growth to be in low single-digit percentage, below the previous years level, due to a soft performance in the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 关税混乱可能使墨西哥陷入技术性衰退
item.description: 据分析师称，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普时好时坏的关税政策对本已疲软的经济增长造成了严重破坏，墨西哥经济似乎有望在第一季度出现萎缩，进入技术性衰退。【原文：Mexico's economy appears on track to contract in the first quarter, entering a technical recession, according to analysts, as U.S. President Donald Trump’s on-again, off-again tariffs wreak havoc on growth that was already weakening.】

item.title: 研究显示，发行绿色债券的企业更善于解决排放问题
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）的最新分析显示，发行绿色债券的公司往往更善于减少温室气体排放，尤其是在污染严重的行业。【原文：Companies that issue green bonds tend to be better at reducing their greenhouse gas emissions, especially in heavily polluting sectors, new analysis from the Bank for International Settlements has shown.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 分析 美国电力需求激增之际小型核电举步维艰
item.description: 从美国能源部长到大型科技公司，每个人都将小型模块化核反应堆作为应对蓬勃发展的电力需求的潜在方案，但由于成本和监管障碍，该技术正努力实现商业化。【原文：Everyone from the U.S. energy secretary to Big Tech touts small modular nuclear reactors as a potential answer to booming power demand, but the technology is struggling to become commercial due to costs and regulatory hurdles.】

item.title: 消息人士称美国银行裁减 150 个投资银行初级职位
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士周二告诉路透社，美国银行最近一次裁员已裁掉了其投资银行 150 个初级银行家的职位。【原文：Bank of America's latest cull has eliminated 150 jobs of junior bankers at its investment bank, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普扩大金属关税范围，从马蹄铁到推土机刀片等商品都将受影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将在数小时内启动对钢铁和铝的大规模关税，这将首次打击价值近1500亿美元的金属制造衍生产品，从螺母和螺栓到推土机刀片，威胁到工业和消费者的成本增加。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's bulked-up tariffs on steel and aluminum due to launch within hours will hit nearly $150 billion worth of derivative products made from the metals for the first time, ranging from nuts and bolts to bulldozer blades and threatening cost increases for industry and consumers alike.】

item.title: 洗钱问题引发巴西重新审视金融科技报告规则
item.description: 巴西税务局局长周二表示，巴西最终需要重新讨论要求金融科技公司向税务局报告交易价值的问题。【原文：Brazil will eventually need to resume discussions on requiring financial technology companies to report transaction values to the tax revenue service, the agency's head said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲市场放缓，雷诺面包车工厂裁员 300 人
item.description: 雷诺汽车制造商雷诺集团周二表示，将在法国北部的一家面包车工厂裁员 300 人，以应对经济不确定性增加导致的欧洲商用车需求放缓。【原文：Renault Group will cut 300 jobs at a van factory in northern France, the carmaker said on Tuesday, responding to slowing European demand for commercial vehicles in the face of growing economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 西班牙将对未标注人工智能生成内容的行为处以巨额罚款
item.description: 西班牙政府周二批准了一项法案，对使用人工智能（AI）生成的内容但未适当标注的公司处以巨额罚款，以遏制所谓 "深度伪造 "的使用。【原文：Spain's government approved a bill on Tuesday imposing massive fines on companies that use content generated by artificial intelligence (AI) without properly labelling it as such, in a bid to curb the use of so-called "deepfakes".】

item.title: 惠誉称波音在劳工罢工后恢复生产方面取得进展
item.description: 全球评级机构惠誉周二表示，波音公司在罢工后恢复生产、减少遗留库存和管理供应链方面取得了初步进展。【原文：Global ratings agency Fitch said on Tuesday that Boeing Co made early progress in resuming production post-strike, reducing legacy inventory, and managing supply chains.】

item.title: 英国官员称英国不会回应美国钢铁关税
item.description: 一位英国政府官员周二表示，英国不会对美国将于周三生效的所有钢铝进口关税征收报复性贸易关税。【原文：Britain will not impose retaliatory trade tariffs in response to U.S. duties on all steel and aluminium imports which are due to come into force on Wednesday, a British government official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 旗下玛莎拉蒂品牌取消电动跑车计划
item.description: 陷入困境的豪华汽车制造商玛莎拉蒂周二表示，由于预期需求不佳，Stellantis 旗下的玛莎拉蒂已取消了 MC20 电动跑车的计划。【原文：Stellantis-owned Maserati has cancelled plans for an electric version of its MC20 sports car because of expected poor demand, the struggling luxury carmaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，美国实物铝溢价飙升至历史新高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将把对加拿大金属征收的关税提高一倍至 50%后，周二美国现货市场上的铝溢价飙升至每公吨 990 美元以上的历史新高。【原文：Price premiums for aluminium on the physical market in the United States soared to a record high above $990 a metric ton on Tuesday after President Donald Trump said he would double planned tariffs on Canadian metal to 50%.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称拜耳股价下跌引来市场监管机构审查
item.description: 一位监管消息人士周二告诉路透社，德国金融市场监管机构已开始初步调查，审查拜耳是否公平披露了获得股东批准的潜在增资计划。【原文：Germany's financial markets watchdog has started an initial probe to examine whether Bayer fairly disclosed plans to get shareholder approval for a potential capital increase, a regulatory source told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 空中客车直升机公司将推出新型 H140 直升机
item.description: 空中客车直升机公司（Airbus Helicopters）周二宣布推出约十年来的首款全新直升机：一款面向紧急服务的轻型双引擎机型。【原文：Airbus Helicopters on Tuesday announced the launch of its first all-new helicopter in about a decade: a light, twin-engined model aimed at emergency services.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，大众汽车将在 Cariad 软件部门裁员 1600 人
item.description: 据《Handelsblatt》商业日报周二援引公司消息人士的话报道，大众汽车计划在今年年底前裁减其 Cariad 软件部门的 1600 名员工。【原文：Volkswagen plans to lay off 1,600 staff at its Cariad software unit by the end of the year, the Handelsblatt business daily reported on Tuesday, citing company sources.】

item.title: 特朗普关税促使消费者削减开支，企业敲响警钟
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税威胁及其不断变化的贸易政策所带来的不确定性正开始对许多行业产生寒蝉效应，企业界警告说，随着消费者对从基本商品到旅游等各种商品的削减，这种不确定性正开始对许多行业产生寒蝉效应。【原文：Uncertainty brought by U.S. President Donald Trump's threats of tariffs and his shape-shifting trade policies are starting to have a chilling effect across many industries, businesses warn, as consumers pull back on everything from basic goods to travel.】

item.title: 波音公司 2 月份交付量同比增长 63
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，2月份该公司交付了44架飞机，高于去年同期的27架，因为该公司正努力稳定并随后增加737 MAX和787机型的产量。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered 44 aircraft in February, up from 27 in the same month a year ago, as it works to stabilize and then increase production of its 737 MAX and 787 models.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官称液化天然气价格将在本世纪末走软
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）首席执行官帕特里克-普亚内（Patrick Pouyanné）周二在休斯敦举行的 CERAWeek 能源会议上表示，他预计液化天然气价格将在本十年末走软。【原文：TotalEnergies CEO Patrick Pouyanné said on Tuesday at the CERAWeek energy conference in Houston that he expected liquefied natural gas prices to soften by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 特朗普称将对加拿大金属征收的关税加倍至 50
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二将他计划对所有从加拿大进入美国的钢铁和铝产品征收的关税提高了一倍，使关税总额达到 50%，以回应安大略省对进入美国的电力征收 25% 的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump on Tuesday doubled his planned tariff on all steel and aluminum products coming into the United States from Canada, bringing the total to 50%, in response to the province of Ontario placing a 25% tariff on electricity coming into the U.S.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份职位空缺增加；裁员人数下降
item.description: 美国 1 月份的职位空缺有所增加，但由于人们担心进口关税的不确定性和政府积极削减开支可能会导致经济活动急剧放缓，未来几个月的劳动力需求可能会走软。【原文：U.S. job openings increased in January, but demand for labor is likely to soften in the months ahead amid concerns that uncertainty over import tariffs and aggressive government spending cuts could cause a sharp slowdown in economic activity.】

item.title: 意大利 Synapsia 公司与阿联酋 Bold Technologies 公司签署价值 25 亿美元的协议
item.description: Synapsia 公司首席执行官丹尼尔-马里内利（Daniele Marinelli）告诉路透社记者，意大利 Synapsia 公司与阿联酋 Bold Technologies 公司签署了一份价值 25 亿美元的合同，为阿布扎比提供人工智能驱动的城市管理服务。【原文：Italy's Synapsia has signed a $2.5-billion contract with UAE's Bold Technologies to provide AI-powered city management services for Abu Dhabi, Synapsia CEO Daniele Marinelli told Reuters.】

item.title: Verizon 警告称竞争激烈导致用户增长 "疲软"，股价下跌
item.description: Verizon 周二警告称，第一季度用户增长可能会 "疲软"，因为竞争对手运营商会通过促销活动吸引用户，这导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 5.3%。【原文：Verizon warned on Tuesday that first-quarter subscriber growth would likely be "soft" as rival carriers attract customers with promotions, sending its shares down 5.3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: Verizon 警告称竞争激烈导致用户增长 "疲软"，股价下跌
item.description: Verizon 周二警告称，第一季度用户增长可能会 "疲软"，因为竞争对手运营商会通过促销活动吸引用户，这导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 5.3%。【原文：Verizon warned on Tuesday that first-quarter subscriber growth would likely be "soft" as rival carriers attract customers with promotions, sending its shares down 5.3% in premarket trading.】
